    public class Asteroid
extends city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
    The base class for all the asteroids

      • Asteroid

        public Asteroid(city.cs.engine.World world,
                city.cs.engine.Shape s,
                java.lang.String i,
                int h,
                float scale,
                int Score)
        Parameters:
        world - The world for the asteroid to be in
        s - The shape of the Asteroid
        i - The link to the image of the Asteroid
        h - The initial health of the Asteroid
        scale - The scale of the image
        Score - The score which destroying this asteroid will give
